content: **knitted jumper in drops air the piece is worked top down with raglan two-coloured english rib and double neck sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-498 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl chest measurements 100-108-118-126-140-148 cm 39⅜ -42½ -46½ -49½ -55 -58⅜ **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200-250-250-300-300-350 g colour 16 blue 200-200-250-250-250-300 g colour 02 wheat **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 14 stitches in width and 36 row in height with english rib on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size -------------------------------------------------------
